import React from "react"; import { FaFolderOpen } from "react-icons/fa"; function Portfolio() { return (

HR Portfolio Highlights

Recruitment & Hiring

I created inclusive job descriptions, interview rubrics, and onboarding frameworks for student leader hiring at OGISL. One major success was redesigning interview guides aligned with NACE competencies and DEI standards, which improved diverse applicant engagement and onboarding clarity.

Training & Development

I led structured onboarding and peer-based training for Graduate Assistants and student leaders. I also created reusable materials such as slide decks, how-to docs, and simulation-based guides. These increased role clarity and boosted feedback scores.

Employee Experience

I developed and analyzed engagement surveys, identifying areas of misalignment in communication and recognition. Based on findings, I collaborated on campaigns that improved student inclusion and retention in co-curricular programs.

Research & Analytics

Using the MLQ and JSS scales, I co-led a research study evaluating how leadership styles affect Gen Z job satisfaction. I designed surveys, presented findings, and translated results into actionable development strategies.

Systems & Innovation

I created a business model for ThriveLocal , a platform that connects newly relocated employees with local well-being resources. From user personas to prototype design, the project taught me how to link HR theory with real-world application.

); } export default Portfolio;
